ComicInfo.Summary:
“City at War,” Part 3. The Turtles race against time to save one of their own, but beset by obstacles on all sides—including the Earth Protection Force and the tide of approaching battle between two warring ninja clans—will they be too late?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Dave Wachter | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Ben Bates | 3 | RE | Montreal Comiccon Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | 4 | RE | Montreal Comiccon Exclusive Variant Cover (Black & White) | Kevin Eastman | 5 | RE | Comics & Ponies Exclusive Variant Cover | Kevin Eastman (a) & Tomi Varga (c) | Missing | RE | TMNT.com Exclusive Variant Cover | None | 6 |
